隨.definition: to follow; to comply with; varying according to...; to allow; subsequently

隨之而後.definition: from that; following from that; after that

隨便.definition: as one wishes; as one pleases; at random; negligent; casual; wanton

隨俗.definition: according to custom; to do as local custom requires; do as the Romans do

隨口胡謅.definition: to talk random nonsense (idiom); to say whatever comes into one's head

隨叫隨到.definition: to be available at any time; to be on call

隨喜.definition: (Buddhism) to be moved at the sight of good deeds; to join in charitable deeds; to tour temples

隨地.definition: according to the location; everywhere; any place; from any location; from wherever you like

隨大流.definition: to follow the crowd; going with the tide

隨大溜.definition: to follow the crowd; going with the tide

隨州.definition: see 隨州市|随州市[Sui2zhou1 Shi4]

隨州市.definition: Suizhou, prefecture-level city in Hubei Province 湖北省[Hu2bei3 Sheng3]

隨從.definition: to accompany; to follow; to attend; entourage; attendant

隨心.definition: to fulfill one's desire; to find sth satisfactory

隨心所欲.definition: (idiom) to follow one's heart's desires; to do as one pleases

隨性.definition: casual; laid-back; doing as one pleases

隨想.definition: random thoughts; (in book titles etc) impressions; jottings

隨意.definition: as one wishes; according to one's wishes; at will; voluntary; conscious

隨手.definition: conveniently; without extra trouble; while doing it; in passing

隨時.definition: at any time; at all times; at the right time; whenever necessary

隨時待命.definition: on call; always available; ready at all times

隨機.definition: according to the situation; pragmatic; random

隨機存取存儲器.pinyin: suí jī cún qǔ cún chǔ qì

隨機存取記憶體.pinyin: suí jī cún qǔ jì yì tǐ

隨機應變.definition: to change according to the situation (idiom); pragmatic

隨機時間.definition: random period of time; random interval

隨波逐流.definition: to drift with the waves and go with the flow (idiom); to follow the crowd blindly

隨波遜流.definition: to drift with the waves and yield to the flow (idiom); to follow the crowd blindly

隨縣.definition: Sui county in Suizhou 隨州|随州[Sui2 zhou1], Hubei

隨聲附和.definition: to parrot other people's words (idiom); to chime in with others

隨著.definition: along with; in the wake of; following

隨行就市.definition: (of a price) to fluctuate according to the market; to sell at the market price

隨訪.definition: to accompany; (of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)

隨身.definition: to (carry) on one's person; to (take) with one

隨遇而安.definition: at home wherever one is (idiom); ready to adapt; flexible; to accept circumstances with good will

隨順.definition: to follow; to go along with

隨風.definition: wind-borne; tossed about by the wind

隨風倒柳.definition: lit. a willow that bends with the wind; one with no fixed principles (idiom)

隨風倒舵.definition: to trim one's sails with the wind; to adopt different attitude depending on the circumstances (idiom)
